name: Multirotor Sim 2
description: Experience the speed of FPV Racing. Upgrade with new parts and set the records!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Dual Core 2.0Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GPU with at least 512Mb of VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Real RC remote control support. It is advisable to connect the transmitter from your drone or gamepad!
